debt_section: As of December 31, 2023, Intel Corporation had total debt of $39,455 million. The company's leverage ratio was 1.2x EBITDA. Management remains committed to maintaining investment-grade credit ratings and strong liquidity.
earnings_excerpt: Intel Corporation reported strong results for fiscal year 2023. Operating margin was 25.4%, reflecting continued focus on operational efficiency. Management provided guidance for continued growth in the coming year.
